Pages.Text: To eat food, which restores Stamina, simply double-click on any food you are carrying in your inventory.   Notice that you can STACK food items.  You can recognize a stack by a number in the item's name. You can split off a part of this stack by dragging the slider next to the item's name, and then dragging the icon to a new location.  Tip: Drag a stack of food to the row of slots at the bottom of your screen to create a shortcut!
